review: I bought this for my dad, and for the most part he seems to really like it.  The initial setup was a little bit glitchy (youtube wouldn't stream at first), but sorted itself out after a couple hours.  All in all, it seems to work pretty well for what it does, but I think I would be much more inclined to get some other streaming stick that doesn't rely on a computer or a smart phone over this if I were to buy for myself.
author: Brendan Bush
